summary: In a distant future, a the young cyborg Gally is found on a scrapheap by the Cyberdoctor Daisuke Ido, who rebuilds her and becomes her surrogate father.
cast: Miki Itô|Shunsuke Kariya|Kappei Yamaguchi|Edward Glen|Mami Koyama|Shigeru Chiba|Ryûzaburô Ôtomo|Kazuhiko Kishino|Kôji Totani|Takumi Yamazaki|Kazuyuki Sogabe|Rick Peeples|Michitaka Kobayashi|Naoki Makishima|Tomoko Maruo|Shinobu Satouchi|Bryan Bounds|John Bull|Angel Fisher|Matt Greenfield|John Guerrasio|Tamsin Hollo|Aaron Krohn|Guil Lunde|Tristan MacAvery|Stuart Milligan|Larissa Murray|Andy Orjuela|Lorraine Reyes|William Roberts|Dan Rockwell|Jennifer Rutherford|Doug Smith|Spike Spencer|Kurt Stoll|Amanda Winn Lee|Laura Chapman
title: Alita, ángel de combate
